text: Burtakovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Alegazovsky Selsoviet, Mechetlinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 248 as of 2010. There are 5 streets. == Geography == It is located 16 km from Bolsheustyikinskoye, 4 km from Alegazovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Mechetlinsky District
title: Burtakovka
